data.system_settings: MacBook Air Early 2015, MacOS High Sierra 10.13.4
data.actual_result: The regular right click menu opens, with the option to paste, find languages and toggle spellchecker(actually works)
data.short_description: With 10 people in a group DM, right clicking the text box in the invite people to DM brings up the right click menu.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a group DM with 10 people in it - Open the invite friends to DM popup - Right-click the text box within the popup
